bibl.title: Alph, the Sacred River, Ran: Geographical Subterfuge in Pindar Olympian 1.20.
bibl.note: The fact that both Pindar (Olympian 1, 14-23a) and Bacchylides (Ode 5, 37-39; 178b-186) name Alpheus while praising the steed suggests it was part of Hieron's "programme".
